sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>These artificial flesh coatings are used both to treat injuries and to coat cybernetic limbs. Synthskin is more commonly used to bond with real tissue, usually to aid in recovery, while synthflesh is more often used to cover mechanical devices to make them appear organic; these can include entire droids when a realistic appearance is desired. As with stimpacks, synthskin is made by countless companies, although BioTech Industries is a leading manufacturer in the field.  Synthskin applications can be used as first aid to treat cuts and bruises. Synthskin applications are one-use items.  Models Include: Numerous Variants.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Synthskin</name> <number>GEAR0001062</number> <price>10</price> <range/> <rarity>0</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 19:18:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0161ab642f14a450e0f497eef699b611</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 19:18:58</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
